steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'WordArt' button.
Select the desired WordArt style from the gallery.
Type the desired text in the WordArt placeholder.
Customize the WordArt by changing the font, size, color, etc., using the options in the 'Format' tab.
Position and resize the WordArt as needed.
Save the changes to the document.
